pullrequest.title: Show and Revoke permissions in User Metrics

content.raw:
I addressed the comments @andres_fortier . The username and config identity information were included in the confirmation dialog. Also, the event is no longer passed from the confirmation dialog to the action method. We only pass the `targetUsername` we want to remove.

![Capture 2017-06-19_12-52-26_pm.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1032371288-Capture%202017-06-19_12-52-26_pm.png 'Capture 2017-06-19_12-52-26_pm.png')

Renamed the callbacks from `gz-grant` to be consistent. To keep consistency, I also renamed the ID of the confirmation dialog from `permissionRemoveDialog` to `permissionRevokeDialog`. We *remove users* and *revoke permissions*.

I opened [CLOUD-174](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-174) to keep track on the method rename issue you mentioned.

please take a look @preyna
